name: Her Jam
description:
What I love the most
is the one I hold close

and what I love secondly to such
is something I have during brunch or even lunch

it's not a clam
nor or is it a ram
rather it's her sweet and succulent Jam

"Her Jam" is short 5-20 experience that was made in rpg maker vx ace, and follows the story of a loving couple and their quest to eat some jam!
